name: tabeliao-node
description: Node library that register services into a service discovery

scripts.local-coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/** -R spec && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/** -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Matheus Guilarducci <mguilarducci@gmail.com>
